revised_title: Limestone Nodule Structure and Trigonocarpon Analysis in Bituminous Coal
tldr: The authors examine limestone nodules found within seams of bituminous coal and describe the structure and composition of the nodules, as well as the Trigonocarpon plant fossils contained within them. They discuss the potential significance of these nodules in understanding the conversion of plants into bituminous coal and the relationship between various plant genera.
